pullrequest.title: More functions to handle enum config widgets

content.raw: I was wondering about this too. An earlier implementation was passing a text value for the item and also unique data for it to be searchable. But then I realized I'd have to change the SetEnumValue logic to handle text and data, so I removed it... Maybe if the user wants to add duplicates, they have to handle it themselves...? Or I can bring data back...
content.html: I was wondering about this too. An earlier implementation was passing a text value for the item and also unique data for it to be searchable. But then I realized I'd have to change the SetEnumValue logic to handle text and data, so I removed it... Maybe if the user wants to add duplicates, they have to handle it themselves...? Or I can bring data back...
